trans-unit.source: Applies metadata to an assembly that indicates that a type is an unmanaged type.
trans-unit.target: 适用于程序集，该值指示类型为非托管的类型的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Compilers use the NativeCppClassAttribute attribute when building assemblies to indicate that a type is an unmanaged type defined in C or C++.
trans-unit.target: 编译器使用 NativeCppClassAttribute 属性生成程序集时以指示类型是在 C 或 c + + 中定义非托管的类型。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used later to correctly handle the unmanaged type when it is imported during interop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性更高版本用于导入期间互操作时正确处理的非托管的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute"></xref> class.
Compilers use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute> attribute when building assemblies to indicate that a type is an unmanaged type defined in C or C++.
trans-unit.target: 编译器使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute>特性生成要指示的类型是在 C 或 c + + 中定义非托管的类型的程序集时。</xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used later to correctly handle the unmanaged type when it is imported during interop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性更高版本用于导入期间互操作时正确处理的非托管的类型。
